rubric_based_tool_use_quality_v1.rubric:
Agent should:
1. Always ask for phone number as unique identifier
2. Use get_pregnancy_by_phone to check existing patients
3. Use upsert_pregnancy_record to save/update patient data
4. Call calculate_edd when LMP is provided
5. Call calculate_anc_schedule when patient asks about appointments
6. Call nurse_agent for high-risk symptoms (bleeding, severe pain, dizziness)
7. Use google_search for nutrition guidance and emergency contacts
8. Provide clear, compassionate responses in simple language
